footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: The purchase of digital currencies is conducted through {{exchangeName}}. By accessing this site, you agree to be bound by its Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
footer.advisory: Digital currencies are not currently backed nor supported by any government or central bank. The value of digital currencies is determined by economy of supply and demand, and they are more volatile than traditional currencies. Trading in digital currencies comes with significant risks, including volatile market price swings or flash crashes, market manipulation, and cybersecurity risks. In addition, digital currency markets and exchanges are not regulated with the same controls or customer protections available in equity, option, futures, or foreign exchange investing. Digital currency trading requires knowledge of digital currency markets. In attempting to profit through digital currency trading, you must compete with traders worldwide. You should have appropriate knowledge and experience before engaging in substantial digital currency trading. Digital currency trading may not generally be appropriate, particularly with funds drawn from retirement savings, student loans, mortgages, emergency funds, or funds set aside for other purposes. Digital currency trading can lead to large and immediate financial losses. Under certain market conditions, you may find it difficult or impossible to liquidate a position quickly at a reasonable price. This can occur, for example, when the market for a particular digital currency suddenly drops, or if trading is halted due to recent news events, unusual trading activity, or changes in the underlying digital currency system. Several federal agencies have also published advisory documents surrounding the risks of virtual currency. For more information see the <1>CFPB’s Consumer Advisory</1>, the <3>CFTC’s Customer Advisory</3>, the <5>SEC’s Investor Alert</5>, and <7>FINRA’s Investor Alert</7>.
footer.legal: {{exchangeName}} does not make any investment recommendations. Neither the listing of a digital currency on this website nor any other communication, whether made through this website or in any other way, should be construed as a recommendation to buy or sell any security.

tooltip.settings: Change the theme, language, or fiat estimation currency.

exchange.minNumber: The number must be greater than 0.00000001

accountVerification.kycRedirectWarning: You will now be redirected to our third party processing services relating to KYC verification, which is a separate platform owned by a third party.
accountVerification.requiresKyc: You must be KYC verified to access this feature.
accountVerification.rejected: Your submitted information was rejected, please try again.
accountVerification.approved: Your account has been successfully verified!
accountVerification.pending: Your information is currently under review.
accountVerification.title: Verify Your Account
accountVerification.verificationMsg: Your Account Identity Verification is Level {{level}}

tips.header: Important! Read below before submitting your information:
tips.errorMessage: If you are seeing this message it means that your previous application to verify your account has been declined. This can be for various reasons, please reference the instructions again below.
tips.vpn: Switch off your VPN if you are using one so that we can match your location with your documents submitted. VPN access to the platform is generally not advised.
tips.public: Public wi-fi change regularly which can affect your verification submission, we advise you complete your verification when you are at home or in your office.
tips.completed: Once you have completed verification you will receive an automated email, if you have not received this check your spam folder and email history. If our emails are reaching your spam folder you can click the link at the base of the email to add our emails to your safe senders list.

selfie.why: Why do we ask for this?
selfie.message: We match the photograph of yourself (selfie) with the image of you on the documents uploaded to ensure that there is a facial match in your submissions. Unfortunately uploading a ‘selfie’ is a mandatory part of the submission process and applications for verification that do not include a clear and good quality selfie will be rejected.

accountVerification.ansOne: Please write date of submission and "Bytedex.io" text on a piece of paper and hold on your hand. Please hold your IDCard or Passport or Driver license on the other hand. Please be sure that your face is fully visible and your selfie picture's resolution is high and all texts are readable.
accountVerification.quesTwo: Which documents eligible for address proof?
accountVerification.ansTwo: Please provide formal settlement document or one of the formal bill taken in last 3 months like  electricity,water,natural gas,phone,internet or credit card receipt.

security.boxHeading: {{exchangeName}} encourages the use of two-factor authentication
security.boxParagraphFirst: Two-factor authentication (2fa) greatly increases security by requiring both your password and another form of authentication. {{exchangeName}} implements 2fa utilizing <1>$t(multiFactorAuth.name)</1>. To enable this feature simply download $t(multiFactorAuth.name) on your mobile device and scan the QRCode.
security.boxParagraphSecond: Once you have linked the Authenticator with {{exchangeName}}, enter the $t(multiFactorAuth.length) digit code provided.
security.secretKeyHelp: Please backup your secret key. Resetting 2FA requires opening a support ticket and may require up to 7 days to address.
security.secretKeyBackupSpan: Please back up your secret key.
security.secretKeyBackupParagraph: Resetting your two-factor authentication requires opening a support ticket and may take up to 7 days to address.

phoneVerification.smsVerificationMsg: Enter the verification code received by the {{mobileNumber}}
phoneVerification.mobileNumberRequired: Mobile Number field can'nt be empty

ip-whitelisting.warningMessage: This change will invalidate all your previous sessions including current session and you will be immediately signed out. Please ensure that you have whitelisted your current IP in order to not get locked out. We urge you to use this feature with extra caution, you may lock out completely if you do not have a static IP from your ISP.
ip-whitelisting.warningMessageOptions: Do you want to continue with the change?

affiliates.title: Referrals
affiliates.shareLink: Share your referral link or code with friends to earn a percentage of their trading fees on the platform.
affiliates.multipleTiers: When your referrals invite other users to the platform you will earn a percentage of their trading fees as well!

apiKeys.title: Api Keys
apiKeys.mustEnableGauth: You must enable $t(multiFactorAuth.name) to use this feature
apiKeys.message: Use this page to manage your API keys to interact with the exchange.
apiKeys.message2: When creating an API key be sure to store the private key somewhere safe, you will only see it once.

success.message: Save the private key somewhere safe, you will only see it once

deviceWhitelisting.title: Whitelisted Devices
deviceWhitelisting.warningMessage: This change will invalidate all your previous sessions including current session and you will be immediately signed out. Please ensure that you have whitelisted your current IP in order to not get locked out. We urge you to use this feature with extra caution, you may lock out completely if you do not have a static IP from your ISP.
deviceWhitelisting.warningMessageOptions: Do you want to continue with the change?

feeDiscount.title: Exchange Token Fee Discount
feeDiscount.details: When you enroll into pay with {{exchangeToken}} program, instead of paying trading fees in base or quote currency, you will be paying an equivalent amount from your {{exchangeToken}} balance.
feeDiscount.discountDetails: Your trading fee discount will be determined by the amount of {{exchangeToken}} that is currently held in your account.

tradingDiscount.title: Trading Volume Discount
tradingDiscount.description: Every day your trading volume from the last 30 days are evalulated. You will recieve a trading fee discount based on your past trading volume.

deposits.disclaimerFirst: Do not use this address to deposit any other asset than {{currency}}. Deposits of other assets to this address may result in loss of funds.
deposits.disclaimerSecond: This is your only address for depositing {{currency}}. Multiple deposits can be processed simultaneously.
deposits.disclaimerThird: {{currencyName}} will be deposited into your account once the transaction reaches {{confirmations}} confirmations.

currencyDisclaimer.TEST: This is an example extra disclaimer for the deposit area.

withdrawals.warning: Do not withdraw directly to an ICO or crowdfunding address, you will not receive tokens from these sales.
withdrawals.fiatWarning: Beneficiary name should match the name on your account.

convertFunds.message: You have selected <1>{{numCurrencies}}</1> coins which can be converted to <2>{{numFunds}}</2> {{token}}.

redirect.withdrawalsError: There are currently no currencies enabled for withdrawal.
redirect.depositsError: There are currently no currencies enabled for deposit.

autoSell.description: When Auto Sell is enabled on a '$t(wallet.autoSell.baseCurrency)', any deposit made for that currency will automatically execute a trade to the selected ''$t(wallet.autoSell.sellTo)'.
autoSell.error: Saving preference has failed, please try again later.

addressBook.label: Label
addressBook.description: The address book is used to save addresses that will be used for withdrawals. New addresses can be added to the addres book by filling out the 'Add Address' form.
addressBook.whitelistDescription: When the whitelisting feature is enabled, you will only be able to make withdrawals to addresses already saved in your address book.
addressBook.noAddresses: There are currently no addresses saved.
addressBook.selectAddress: You may select an address from your address book to fill in relevant fields in the form.
addressBook.selectAddressWhitelist: Since address whitelisting is enabled you must select an address from the address book. If you have no saved addresses for a currency you may add an address by clicking on 'Add Address'.
addressBook.otpMessage: You must request an OTP code to complete the form.
addressBook.otpSuccessMessage: The OTP message has been sent to your primary contact method.

banks.description: Save your bank account details here.
banks.noBankAccounts: There are currently no bank accounts saved.
banks.otpMessage: You must request an OTP code to complete the form.
banks.otpSuccessMessage: The OTP message has been sent to your primary contact method.

instaTrade.selectPair: Please select your Currency and Payment Method
instaTrade.feeText: This amount is an estimate after fees are collected.

error.heading: InstaTrade Failed
error.message: Your InstaTrade transaction has failed to complete. Please try again

success.heading: InstaTrade Completed
success.message: Your InstaTrade transaction has been completed successfully.

orderDetails.buyInstruction1: Please confirm that you have successfully transferred the money to the seller through the following payment method.
orderDetails.buyWarning1: The following is the sellers' payment info. please make sure the money is transferred from an account you own. matching you verified name. Money will NOT be transferred automatically by the platform.
orderDetails.buyInstruction2: Please make a payment within $t(OrderData.{{PaymentTimeLimit}}) mins, Otherwise, the order will be cancelled.
orderDetails.buyInstruction3: Please confirm that payment has been made to seller, Malicious clicks will lead to accound frozen.
orderDetails.buyWarning2: WARNING! If you click on "Transferred, next" without making the payment (you need to transfer the money with the payment account, not on Bytedex). Your account will potentially be suspended. The platform reserve the right to claim any damage caused.
orderDetails.beforeAppealInstruction1: You can upload proof of payment and account info in the chatbox to help both sides to verify the payment
orderDetails.beforeAppealInstruction2: Please try to contact the counterparty if you have any problems
orderDetails.beforeAppealInstruction3: If you cannot reach the buyer/seller, or reach an agreement with the other user, please file an appeal
orderDetails.appealWarning1: Reason for appeal and proofs are visible to both parties and CS. Please avoid including any private or sensitive info
orderDetails.appealWarning2: Baseless appeal request can result in banning of the account

reasonForAppeal.label: Reason for Appeal (Mandatory)
reasonForAppeal.placeholder: Please enter the reason for appeal

appealReasons.reason1: I have made a payment but the seller has not released the crypto.
appealReasons.reason2: I paid extra money to the seller.
appealReasons.reason3: I suspected the seller is scamming.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Please provide as much detail as possible

uploadProof.label: Upload Proof (Mandatory)
uploadProof.placeholder: Please provide as much detail as possible

orderDetails.confirmReleaseWarning: ATTENTION! Please be sure to LOG IN THE RECEVING (e.g. Bank/ eWallet) ACCOUNT to confirm that the money has arrived in the "Available Balance"
orderDetails.phoneInfo: Enter the 6 digit code sent to $t(profile.{{mobileNumber}}).
orderDetails.checkConfirmMsg: I confirm that the payment is successfully received with correct amount and sender information

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: Please do not include any information about BTC, ETH, USDT, BNB and other digital asset names in the transfer notes to prevent payment from being intercepted or bank funds being frozen.
tips.tip2: Your payment will go directly to the seller's account. the digital assets sold by the seller during the transaction will be handled by platform.
tips.tip3: Please complete the payment within the specified time, and be sure to click "Transferred, Next", After the seller confirms the payment , the system will transfer the digital assets to your account.
tips.tip4: If the buyes cancels order 3 times a day, he/she will no longer be able to trade for the rest of the day.
tips.tip5: After 5 pm on weekdays or during non-working days, please limit each transaction within 50,000 CNY, otherwise it will be delayed.

orderDetails.warningOnChatBox: ATTENTION! Do not release crypto before confirming that money has arrived in your Bank account. DO NOT trust anyone that asjs you to release a crypto before payment.
orderDetails.cancelReasonPlaceholder: Please enter the reason for cancellation
orderDetails.cancelReasonsHeading: Why do you want to cancel the order?

cancelOrderTips.title: Tips
cancelOrderTips.tip1: If you have made a payment to the seller, make sure do not cancel order.
cancelOrderTips.tip2: Canceling orders 3 time a day will prevent you from trading for the rest of the day.

orderDetails.paymentToBeMadeByBuyer: Payment to be made by buyer
orderDetails.sellInstruction1: Buyer has not paid, please wait patiently.
orderDetails.paymentConfirmHeading: Please confirm you have received the payment
orderDetails.sellInstruction2: Buyer has made a payment, please release the crypto within $t(OrderData.{{PaymentTimeLimit}}) mins.
orderDetails.cancelReason1: I do not want to trade anymore
orderDetails.cancelReason2: I do not meet the requirements of the advertiser's trading terms and condition
orderDetails.cancelReason3: Seller is asking for extra fee
orderDetails.cancelReason4: Problem with seller's payment method result in unsuccessful PaymentSettings
